mapper.sql: GDS_BID, ACT_NO, GDS_AID, TCUS_ID, SUB_STS, LAGT_ST, TAGT_ST, TXN_CNL, BNK_TYP, BNK_NO, BNK_NAM, ORG_COD, ORG_NAM, TBUS_TP, TCUS_NM, EFF_DAT, IVD_DAT, LER_MSG, TER_MSG, AREA_ID, BATCH_ID, USB_FLG
mapper.insert:
insert into ${GDEUPSB_SCHEMA}.GDS_AGT_WATER
GDS_BID,
ACT_NO,
GDS_AID,
TCUS_ID,
SUB_STS,
LAGT_ST,
TAGT_ST,
TXN_CNL,
BNK_TYP,
BNK_NO,
BNK_NAM,
ORG_COD,
ORG_NAM,
TBUS_TP,
TCUS_NM,
EFF_DAT,
IVD_DAT,
LER_MSG,
TER_MSG,
AREA_ID,
BATCH_ID,
USB_FLG,
#{gdsBid,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{actNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{gdsAid,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{tcusId,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{subSts,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{lagtSt,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{tagtSt,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{txnCnl,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{bnkTyp,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{bnkNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{bnkNam,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{orgCod,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{orgNam,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{tbusTp,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{tcusNm,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{effDat,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{ivdDat,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{lerMsg,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{terMsg,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{areaId,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{batchId,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{usbFlg,jdbcType=CHAR},
mapper.update:
update ${GDEUPSB_SCHEMA}.GDS_AGT_WATER
SUB_STS = #{subSts,jdbcType=CHAR},
LAGT_ST = #{lagtSt,jdbcType=CHAR},
TAGT_ST = #{tagtSt,jdbcType=CHAR},
TXN_CNL = #{txnCnl,jdbcType=CHAR},
BNK_TYP = #{bnkTyp,jdbcType=CHAR},
BNK_NO = #{bnkNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
BNK_NAM = #{bnkNam,jdbcType=CHAR},
ORG_COD = #{orgCod,jdbcType=CHAR},
ORG_NAM = #{orgNam,jdbcType=CHAR},
TBUS_TP = #{tbusTp,jdbcType=CHAR},
TCUS_NM = #{tcusNm,jdbcType=CHAR},
EFF_DAT = #{effDat,jdbcType=CHAR},
IVD_DAT = #{ivdDat,jdbcType=CHAR},
LER_MSG = #{lerMsg,jdbcType=CHAR},
TER_MSG = #{terMsg,jdbcType=CHAR},
AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=CHAR},
BATCH_ID = #{batchId,jdbcType=CHAR},
USB_FLG = #{usbFlg,jdbcType=CHAR},
where GDS_BID = #{gdsBid,jdbcType=CHAR} and ACT_NO = #{actNo,jdbcType=CHAR} and GDS_AID = #{gdsAid,jdbcType=CHAR} and TCUS_ID = #{tcusId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from ${GDEUPSB_SCHEMA}.GDS_AGT_WATER
where
(GDS_BID=#{item.gdsBid,jdbcType=CHAR} AND ACT_NO=#{item.actNo,jdbcType=CHAR} AND GDS_AID=#{item.gdsAid,jdbcType=CHAR} AND TCUS_ID=#{item.tcusId,jdbcType=CHAR})
select * from ${AgtMTb} a, ${AgtSTb} b where a.Gds_BId=#{gdsBId} and a.Act_No=#{actNo} and a.Gds_BId=b.Gds_BId and a.Act_No=b.Act_No order by b.Sub_Sts for read only
select * from ${agtSTb} where TCUS_ID=#{cusNo} and TBUS_TP=#{tBusTyp} and SUB_STS = '0'

select 'JH'||#{actDat}||#{tSeqNo} RptFil, right('000000'||rtrim(char(row_number()over())),6) DtlSeq, a.Act_No ActNo, a.Act_Nm ActNm, a.Tel_No TelNo, a.Mob_Tel Mob_Tel, a.EMail EMail, a.Id_Typ IdTyp, a.Id_No IdNo, b.Txn_Cnl TxnCnl, b.Bnk_No BnkNo, b.Bnk_Typ BnkTyp, b.Bnk_Nam BnkNam, b.Eff_Dat EffDat, b.TCus_Id TCusId, case when a.Act_Typ in ( '0','A','B','9' ) then '1' when a.Act_Typ in ( '1','2','4' ) then '0' end PrvFlg, case when a.Act_Typ in ( '0','A','B','9' ) then Gds_AId when a.Act_Typ in ( '1','2','4' ) then '' end GdsAId from ${agtMTb} a, ${agtSTb} b where a.Gds_BId=#{gdsBId} and a.Gds_BId=b.Gds_BId and a.Act_No=b.Act_No and ( b.Eff_Dat between #{begDat} and #{endDat} ) and b.Sub_Sts='0' and b.TAgt_St in ( 'U','C' ) and b.usb_flg='Y' and length(trim(b.Tcus_Id)) = 10 order by b.TCus_Id, b.TBus_Tp asc for read only

select a.Act_Typ actTyp, a.Act_No actNo, b.TCUS_NM actNm, a.Id_Typ idTyp, a.Id_No idNo, a.Mob_Tel mobTel, b.TCus_Id tCusId, b.Txn_Cnl txnCnl, b.Eff_Dat effDat, b.Ivd_Dat ivdDat from ${agtMTb} a, ${agtSTb} b where a.Gds_BId=#{gdsBId} and a.Gds_BId=b.Gds_BId and a.Act_No=b.Act_No and ( b.Eff_Dat between #{begDat} and #{endDat} ) and b.Sub_Sts='0'
mapper.update: update ${agtSTb} set BATCH_ID=#{batchId},USB_FLG=#{usbFlg} where Gds_BId=#{gdsBId} and Eff_Dat between #{begDat} and #{endDat} and Sub_Sts='0' and TAgt_St in ( 'U','C' ) and USB_FLG='Y'
mapper.select: select * from ${agtMtb} a, ${agtStb} b where a.Gds_BId=b.Gds_BId and a.Act_No=b.Act_No and ( b.LAGT_ST='U' or b.TAgt_St='U' or b.TAgt_St='C' ) and SUB_STS='0' for read only
mapper.update: update ${agtStb} set TAgt_St=#{tAgtSt}, TER_MSG=#{terMsg},USB_FLG='Y' where Gds_BId=#{gdsBId} and ACT_NO=#{actNo} and Sub_Sts='0'
mapper.select: select act_no from ${GDEUPSB_SCHEMA}.GDS_AGT_WATER where BATCH_ID=#{batchId,jdbcType=CHAR} and usb_flg != 'Y'
